title: Chapter 210 - 200: M Continent
body:
Chapter 210 - 200: M Continent

Chapter 210: Chapter 200: M Continent

Translator: 549690339

Daisy Zane went to Spotlight to discuss the concept release conference for the past two quarters with Felix Baker.

Kevin Clark had to go on a business trip, so he couldn’t accompany her. After dropping her off at Spotlight, he let Michael Jackson stay behind and got into his car to leave.

After staying for more than an hour at Spotlight, Daisy Zane went home to check on Charles Amos and Wilton Edwards. Then she bought a ticket to the M Continent.

After nearly fourteen hours of flying, the plane landed at dawn in M Continent, just as light was appearing at the horizon.

Outside the airport, James Collins wore sunglasses, with green hair, wearing a casual shirt with the top two buttons undone, leaning against the car door and playing with his phone.

He looked like an irreverent young master.

A few minutes later, Daisy Zane came out of the airport.

The man sitting in the driver’s seat of the car tapped on the glass. The source of this content nov(el)bi((n))

James Collins immediately looked towards the airport entrance. Upon seeing Daisy Zane’s figure, he immediately straightened his body, his thin lips curving into a smile.

Then he ran to Daisy Zane and : “Sister!”

Daisy was wearing athletic clothes and didn’t even carry a suitcase. When she saw James Collins, she first looked at his green hair:

“Sis, long time no see. Did you miss me?”

“You...turned green?”

James Collins: ......This is fashion.

Looking at his hair, Daisy Zane didn’t want to speak. Blessings on his fair face, or else this guy could’ve been gone long ago. She would have to spend a few years grooming another one.

As she was thinking, a whistle suddenly entered her ears.

Daisy retracted her gaze and looked towards the source of the whistle.

Right in front of the car where James Collins had been leaning on, stood a beautiful woman.

She was dressed all in black with high heels, exuding cool and sexy vibes.

A very standard handsome Western face, deep eye sockets, a high nose, thin lips, and white skin.

Her hair was very short, all combed back into a slick back. Two silver earrings adorned her left auricle.

Her body was also very good, curves were beautiful, and her black top was slightly translucent.

Daisy Zane raised an eyebrow: “Less meddling in Gael Easton’s affairs. The water behind him is too deep. At least cause less trouble in M Continent.”

“I know.” Liana Butch lit a cigarette and said, “It’s fun.”

Daisy Zane went upstairs to the third floor. She opened a nearby room and took a glance inside before turning to look at Liana Butch and say, “I will take a nap. We will elaborate on the deployment in the afternoon.”

Liana Butch leaned against the door with his deep eyes, slightly raised. “Shall I sleep with you?”

“If you can beat me, I don’t mind.” Daisy Zane said, looking at him.

Liana Butch shrugged, “Hard to please.” Daisy Zane gave a small laugh.

Liana Butch sighed, “Fine, you sleep. I’ll go.”

Daisy Zane slept until noon and then had a meal. In the afternoon, she further elaborated on the deployment.

The attack would take place from the airspace and sea at the same time.

They would set off at 6 PM.

Daisy Zane, James Collins, and Liana Butch boarded the same plane.

After more than two hours, they arrived in the airspace above Koymoon Island.

From above, Liana Butch observed the terrain of Koymoon Island gradually become clear. After a few seconds, he looked at Daisy Zane.

Wearing a mask, Daisy Zane looked down at the island, feeling Liana Butch’s gaze. She nodded after waiting for two seconds.

Liana Butch pressed his earpiece, “All units pay attention...”

“Report, there is a situation.” The voice coming from the earpiece suddenly interrupted Liana Butch.

Daisy Zane, who was about to put on her hat, looked up at Liana Butch.

Liana Butch furrowed his brows, “Go on.’ “Someone beat us to the island and has already started fighting.”

“Were you discovered?” Liana Butch inquired.

“Yes. The other party shouted at us first and saw that we did not move. They temporarily refrained from attacking.”

The current elevation of the helicopter did not allow them to see the situation on the island clearly. Daisy Zane thought for a moment and said, “Tell the people on the sea to retreat 200 meters and not to take any action. Make sure no one escapes.”

“Yes.” Liana Butch immediately relayed the order. “What about us?”

Not many people knew about the situation on Koymoon Island. Although not excluding personal enmity, but in case...

“Give me the computer.”

James Collins immediately handed the computer to Daisy Zane..
